title: [Krolvin Carrack, Forecastle]
description: Overhead the hatch covering the ceiling grating has sprung partially open, letting a few beams of moonlight filter in.  The room is a maze of rope hammocks slung fore-and-aft, all hanging aslant of the starboard-tilted deck.  A steep companionway leads down.

Overhead the hatch covering the ceiling grating has sprung partially open, letting a few rays of sunlight filter in.  The room is a maze of rope hammocks slung fore-and-aft, all hanging aslant of the starboard-tilted deck.  A steep companionway leads down.
